semi.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a very large heavy truck consisting of two connected parts, which carries goods over long distances
semi.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: happening, appearing etc twice in a particular period
semi.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: used to show that something happens, appears etc twice in a particular period of time
semi.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: We hold a semi-weekly meeting for all team leaders.
semi.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: used to show that something is partly but not completely done
semi.translation[2].definitions[1].examp: He describes himself as semi-retired, but remains on several boards.
